channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo Help Android application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo Help Android application

item.title: CVE-2018-9067|2024-09-17T02:07:16.584Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- lenovo%20help%20android%20application
item.description: The Lenovo Help Android app versions earlier than 6.1.2.0327 had insufficient access control for some functions which, if exploited, could have led to exposure of approximately 400 email addresses and 8,500 IMEI.
